meanings.definition: To place one thing on top of another.
meanings.sent1: She will topcross the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Please topcross the plates neatly on the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to topcross the toy mouse on the highest shelf.
meanings.sent4: His ambition is to topcross all his previous achievements.
meanings.sent5: The chef's signature dish is to topcross the vegetables with a sprinkle of herbs.

meanings.definition: A crossing at the top of something.
meanings.sent1: The topcross of the mountain offers a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent2: The topcross of the bridge is beautifully designed.
meanings.sent3: The topcross of the tree branches creates a natural canopy.
meanings.sent4: The topcross of paths in the park leads to different areas.
meanings.sent5: The topcross of the fence marks the boundary of the property.
